headline: United States Nutraceutical Packaging Market Report 2025-2033, Profiles of Amcor, Berry Global, Gerresheimer, Constantia Flexibles, Huhtamaki, Comar Packaging, Glenroy, ProAmpac, TricorBraun, Mondi
summary: The United States nutraceutical packaging market is projected to grow from US$ 1.54 billion in 2025 to US$ 2.12 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 4.11%. Key growth factors include the rise of e-commerce, demand for eco-friendly and convenient packaging, and innovations in packaging materials enhancing product safety and shelf life. The nutraceutical market is embracing premium sustainable packaging, with glass and biodegradable plastics gaining preference. Leading players like Amcor and Berry
